cab.content: SECRET-OPERATIONS .From:- General Plumer, Italy. To:- 0 .1 .G .S ., War Office.Despatched:- 12.15 a.m.))17.12 . Ko c o ivod :- 5.30 a.n.)0.128.Considerable local fighting has taken place with varying success. This morning Diaz was generally satisfied with the situation and greatly pleased with the report as to state of the morale of tho troops which he had had from his Army Commanders.
